Title: Requires the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly to provide each member of their respective chamber with any reports issued to them
Summary: Requires the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly to provide each member of their respective chamber with any reports issued to them.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly to provide each member of their respective chamber with any reports issued to them
